column1: '''Ned Pruner''' was the jailor of [[Archet]]'s Jail.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], ''The Jailor''</ref> He is the husband of [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Peg Pruner
column2: Peg Pruner]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], ''Question the Prisoner''</ref> When the [[Blackwolds]] assaulted Archet and freed [[Calder Cob]], as well as some other captives, from their jails Ned tried to stop them. In a fight inside the Jailyard he was killed by Calder Cob and another prisoner.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Bree-land Introduction
